# Java Console Project

This is a simple Java project that prints to the console.

## Project Structure
- `src/main/java/` - Main Java source files
- `Main.java` - Entry point of the application

## Requirements
- Java Development Kit (JDK) 8 or higher
- VS Code with Java extension pack

## How to Run
1. Compile: `javac src/main/java/Main.java`
2. Run: `java -cp src/main/java Main`
